name: Endless Suburbia
description: Embark on a bone-chilling horror journey in Endless Suburbia, created by only a single developer. Drive through a maze of suburbs as an eerie UFO invasion looms above, giant spiders weave their deadly webs, a malevolent killer mime haunts your every move, and an unseen presence follows your every step. Experience six different horrifying scenarios by starting the game again and again. Prepare yourself for a chilling journey into an atmospheric nightmare, where you'll encounter spine-tingling sensations that will keep you on the edge of your seat. In Endless Suburbia, prepare to immerse yourself in a thrilling experience that will keep you captivated throughout your gameplay. Can you face the unsettling encounters and maintain your composure? Take the plunge into the unknown and uncover the haunting depths that lie ahead.
